thread.title: James Corden delivers brutal assessment on Cristiano Ronaldo's airport statue
thread.title_full: James Corden delivers brutal assessment on Cristiano Ronaldo's airport statue

author: Thomas Bristow
title: James Corden delivers brutal assessment on Cristiano Ronaldo's airport statue
text:
James Corden delivers brutal assessment on Cristiano Ronaldo's airport statue The Late Late Show host compared the bust to a David Beckham speciality Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now James Corden weighs in on Cristiano Ronaldo's statue - and doesn't hold back Share this video Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Former Gavin & Stacey star and Late Late Show host James Corden has weighed in on Cristiano Ronaldo's airport statue. 
The Real Madrid star attended the ceremony in Madeira on Wednesday in which an airport was named after him. 
Politicians on the island decided to change the airport's name after Ronaldo's efforts in Portugal's Euro 2016 success - the country's first major international title. 
But Ronaldo's thunder was stolen somewhat by his own bust. 
The statue drew unwarranted attention because of its poor resemblance of the star. Read More Cristiano Ronaldo standing next to his bust (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Ronaldo's bust trolls Ronaldo (Photo: AFP) 
Fans flocked to Twitter to compare the bust to a variety of things, including the head from Art Attack. 
Naturally, this became a subject of conversation for Corden, who said: "It's terrible! It looks like his face was bended like Beckham. "What is that?" (Photo: YouTube/The Late Late Show with James Corden) 
"Just because it's the soccer player it doesn't mean you have to actually sculpt it with your feet. 
"It's one of the worst statues of Ronaldo ever." poll loading Do you think this Cristiano Ronaldo statue is anatomically correct? 5000+ VOTES SO FAR
